name: Ext_R3_ChargeItem_overrideReason
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.ChargeItem.overrideReason for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents ChargeItem.overrideReason from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ChargeItem|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Reason for overriding the list price/factor
element.definition: If the list price or the rule based factor associated with the code is overridden, this attribute can capture a text to indicate the  reason for this action.
element.comment: `ChargeItem.overrideReason` maps to R5 `ChargeItem.overrideReason`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
